title: Risers- The maximum height of a riser shall be 17
clause_text: Risers- The maximum height of a riser shall be 17.50 cm in any occupancy. However, on an internal stairway within a dwelling unit a riser may be 25 cm high.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Risers- The maximum height of a riser shall be 17.50 cm in any occupancy. However, on an internal stairway within a dwelling unit a riser may be 25 cm high.
